amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit the use of private attorney actions to enforce state laws in state courts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-148 to preserve the ability of local prosecutors to enforce state antitrust and consumer protection laws in state courts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 234 (Roll no. 269).
